props.allowedDates: Restricts which dates can be selected.
props.calendarIcon: The icon shown in the header when in 'input' **input-mode**.
props.dayFormat: Allows you to customize the format of the day string that appears in the date table. Called with date (ISO 8601 **date** string) arguments.
props.displayDate: The date displayed in the picker header.
props.eventColor: Sets the color for event dot. It can be string (all events will have the same color) or `object` where attribute is the event date and value is boolean/color/array of colors for specified date or `function` taking date as a parameter and returning boolean/color/array of colors for that date.
props.events: Array of dates or object defining events or colors or function returning boolean/color/array of colors.
props.landscape: Changes the picker to landscape mode.
props.firstDayOfWeek: Sets the first day of the week, starting with 0 for Sunday.
props.format: Takes a date object and returns it in a specified format.
props.header: Text shown when no **display-date** is set.
props.headerDateFormat: Allows you to customize the format of the month string that appears in the header of the calendar. Called with date (ISO 8601 **date** string) arguments.
props.inputMode: Toggles between showing dates or inputs.
props.locale: Sets the locale. Accepts a string with a BCP 47 language tag.
props.localeFirstDayOfYear: Sets the day that determines the first week of the year, starting with 0 for **Sunday**. For ISO 8601 this should be 4.
props.modeIcon: Icon displayed next to the current month and year, toggles year selection when clicked.
props.monthFormat: Formatting function used for displaying months in the months table. Called with date (ISO 8601 **date** string) arguments.
props.multiple: Allow the selection of multiple dates. The **range** value selects all dates between two selections.
props.nextIcon: Sets the icon for next month/year button.
props.prevIcon: Sets the icon for previous month/year button.
props.reactive: Updates the picker model when changing months/years automatically.
props.readonly: Makes the picker readonly (doesn't allow to select new date).
props.scrollable: Allows changing displayed month with mouse scroll.
props.selectedItemsText: Text used for translating the number of selected dates when using *multiple* prop. Can also be customizing globally in [Internationalization](/customization/internationalization).
props.showCurrent: Toggles visibility of the current date/month outline or shows the provided date/month as a current.
props.showAdjacentMonths: Toggles visibility of days from previous and next months.
props.showWeek: Toggles visibility of the week numbers in the body of the calendar.
props.titleDateFormat: Allows you to customize the format of the date string that appears in the title of the date picker. Called with date (ISO 8601 **date** string) arguments.
props.type: Determines the type of the picker - `date` for date picker, `month` for month picker.
props.value: Date picker model (ISO 8601 format, YYYY-mm-dd or YYYY-mm).
props.viewMode: Determines which picker in the date or month picker is being displayed. Allowed values: `'month'`, `'months'`, `'year'`.
props.weekdayFormat: Allows you to customize the format of the weekday string that appears in the body of the calendar. Called with date (ISO 8601 **date** string) arguments.
props.yearFormat: Allows you to customize the format of the year string that appears in the header of the calendar. Called with date (ISO 8601 **date** string) arguments.
props.yearIcon: Sets the icon in the year selection button.

events.update:viewMode: Emitted when the view mode changes.
events.<domevent>:date: Emitted when the specified DOM event occurs on the date button.
events.<domevent>:month: Emitted when the specified DOM event occurs on the month button.
events.<domevent>:year: Emitted when the specified DOM event occurs on the year button.
events.change: Reactive date picker emits `input` even when any part of the date (year/month/day) changes, but `change` event is emitted only when the day (for date pickers) or month (for month pickers) changes. If `range` prop is set, date picker emits `change` when both [from, to] are selected.
